site_name: Land Adjacent To Former St Giles HospitalSt Giles RoadSE5
description: Erection of a 6 storey building containing medical offices and treatment facilities on the ground floor with 64 flats for NHS key workers on the upper five floors; erection of a single storey plant building in south west corner of site.  (resubmission of previous scheme, revised footprint and new plant storage).
